title: MEGABIT - 8 Bit Music
description: 10 Awesome 8 bit songs for your game!
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack was made based on 8bit style games, made entirely using chiptune it will definitely bring a nostalgic effect to your game and whoever is playing it.


In this package you will find songs designed more for the side of platform games, as most of the 8 bits were like that, but of course if the music fits your game, being it in another style, you can use it with peace of mind!


Some of the songs are for moments of fights with BOSS, others are for faster stages with several enemies, others are quieter.


In addition to the songs you will also take 4 fanfares, 2 for victory and 2 for defeat, these fanfares can be used when defeating a monster, passing the level, dying, among others!


And it still takes 4 SFX (Shot, Big Shot, Cast Shot, Drop on the ground)


By purchasing this package you take all this to your game and encourage me to bring cool content to the community at a super cool price!


CHECK THE PREVIEW


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 18

Number of Audio Cues: 18

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Does music loop: (Yes/No) Yes

Minutes of audio provided: more than 20

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes


Important/Additional Notes: The font used is good times free distributed by DaFont and the text was generated by textCraft, also free for commercial use.
